department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 2 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after November 12 at 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Notice Details
#### Title
- **Roof and HVAC Unit Replacement**
- **Remplacement de toiture et des systèmes CVC**

#### Reference Information
| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS3658651807-Doc3664381977 |
| Amendment Number | 6 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3658651807 |
| Publication Date | 2022-09-14 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2022-11-02T14:00:00 |
| Amendment Date | 2022-10-24 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2022-10-25 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2023-05-02 |
| Tender Status | **Expired**

#### Solicitation Details
| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Procurement Category | *CNST* |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| Selection Criteria | Lowest Price |

#### End User Entities
- **Department of National Defence (DND)**
- **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**

#### Contact Information
- **Name**: Gregoire Morin, SPAC/PSPC
- **Email**: gregoire.morin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Region of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Description
This amendment extends the closing time for bid submissions on the Roof and HVAC Unit Replacement tender. All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by November 2, 2022, at 14:00 EST. Any bids submitted after this date will be considered non-responsive.

#### Additional Details
- **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14101462?extsite=MTQxMDE0NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
- **G/SIN**: None
- **UNSPSC**: *Building maintenance and repair services*
- **Trade Agreements**: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*
- **Regions of Opportunity**: None
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

### Important Notes
All bidders must submit their proposals electronically on the Ariba Discovery website. No paper bids will be accepted. Any bids received after the deadline will be disqualified.
